caption.p: Sulfated and glycosylated xanthones (XGS) as mimetics of several physiologic processes: ( A). Anticoagulant effects as mimetics of heparin, ( B). Antiviral effects as mimetics of GAGs; ( C). Antifouling effects as mimetics of marine antifouling sulfated metabolites. HBD: heparin binding domain; GAG: glycosaminoglycan.
